title: Smart Hisab Pro: UI/UX redesign, admin confirmations, production history worker names, and logout fix

requirements.text: Redesign the overall UI/UX to look like a clean, modern app while keeping existing features and localStorage-based persistence intact (admin panel + user panel). Apply consistent spacing, typography, colors, and component styling across all screens.

quotes: ৪/আমি চাই এই কোডটা দিয়ে তুমি সুন্দর আরো ডিজাইন করে একটা অ্যাপ বানিয়ে দাও

acceptanceCriteria: All major screens (login/registration, admin panel tabs, user dashboard/history) share a consistent visual system (typography, spacing scale, colors).
No existing workflows are removed (data entry, histories, approvals, balances).
All existing stored data remains readable (no breaking changes to localStorage keys/shape unless a safe migration is implemented in frontend).

requirements.text: In the user panel, update the Production History view so each production entry displays the associated worker name(s) clearly (e.g., grouped worker names for that entry), based on the stored production record data.

quotes: ১/ইউজার প্যানেলের প্রোডাকশন হিস্ট্রিতে কর্মীদের নামগুলা শো করবে

acceptanceCriteria: Each production history row/card shows worker name(s) for that entry (not just counts/amounts).
If an entry references multiple workers, all names are displayed in a readable format.
If worker data is missing/deleted, the UI shows a safe fallback label (e.g., "Unknown worker") without crashing.

requirements.text: In the admin panel, show a confirmation message (toast/snackbar/alert) after successful input/save actions across all relevant sections (e.g., Production, Work, Nasta, Payment/Loan, Settings, and Approval actions). Use English user-facing text.

quotes: ২/এডমিন প্যানেলে কোন কিছু ইনপুট দিলে কনফার্মেশন  মেসেজ আসবে

acceptanceCriteria: After a successful save/add/update/delete action in each admin section, a confirmation message appears.
Confirmation messages are in English and clearly state the action outcome (e.g., "Production entry saved").
Error cases do not show a success confirmation; they show an error message instead.

requirements.text: Fix the logout behavior so that clicking Logout reliably logs the user out in packaged/app runtime (not dependent on location.reload). Ensure session/auth state and any in-memory UI state is reset correctly and the user is returned to the login screen.

quotes: ৩/একটা দিয়ে যখন আমি অ্যাপ্লিকেশন এর মাধ্যমে রান করায় তখন লগআউট ক্লিক করলে লগ আউট হয় না

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking Logout always returns the app to the login screen and prevents access to admin/user screens until logging in again.
Logout works without requiring a hard browser reload.
After logout, a new login shows the correct role/state (no stale admin/user state remains).

requirements.text: Adopt a single coherent visual theme (colors, typography, layout style) suitable for a worker accounting app, and enforce it consistently. Do not use a blue+purple palette. Use English for any user-facing text newly introduced during redesign.

quotes: ৪/আমি চাই এই কোডটা দিয়ে তুমি সুন্দর আরো ডিজাইন করে একটা অ্যাপ বানিয়ে দাও

acceptanceCriteria: A defined theme is applied consistently (buttons, inputs, tables, cards, navigation).
No default-looking mixed styles (e.g., mismatched button variants across pages).
Newly added/changed UI labels and messages are in English.

requirements.text: Add the generated static images to the frontend and use them in the UI where appropriate (e.g., login header/brand area) by placing them under frontend/public/assets/generated and referencing them directly from the frontend (no backend routing).
acceptanceCriteria: Frontend renders the images correctly in the UI without requesting them from the backend canister.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text introduced/changed by this build request.
Keep data persisted in browser localStorage (no move to backend persistence).
Do not edit files under frontend/immutablePaths (compose existing UI components instead of modifying them).
Backend must remain single-actor if any backend changes are later needed; no additional backend services.
nonGoals: Adding third-party authentication providers (only Internet Identity is supported by the platform, but not required for this request).
Replacing localStorage with an external database or non-IC backend.
Changing business rules for calculations beyond what is required to show worker names and fix logout.

required: Minimal accounting app logo mark, flat vector style (smart-hisab-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Abstract ledger/workflow header illustration, warm neutral palette (auth-header-illustration.dim_1200x600.png)
